+package com.google.firebase.encoders.proto;

+import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
+import java.io.OutputStream;

+/** OutputStream that only keeps track of the number of bytes written into it. */
+final class LengthCountingOutputStream extends OutputStream {
+  private long length = 0;
+
+  @Override
+  public void write(int b) {
+    length++;

nodes.bodyText: I think this cases cannot happen since you are guaranteed at this point that off and len are positive, or at least 0
